alert.note: Alert for Jemez Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 17 at 3:15AM MDT until July 17 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 97 expected. For the second Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 97 expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, West Central Mountains, Southwest Mountains, and Jemez Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.

area.areaDesc: Jemez Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains
